decks.notes: This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of creatures with different abilities to assemble powerful combos and answer threats from the opponent. The toolbox approach allows the player to search for specific creatures needed for the situation using cards like Chord of Calling and Summoner's Pact. Cards like Delighted Halfling and Springheart Nantuko provide value and flexibility in different stages of the game. The inclusion of support cards like Shuko and Boseiju, Who Endures helps to protect key pieces and ensure the combo goes off smoothly.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly through the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, Tower) and using Karn, the Great Creator to control the board by fetching artifacts and shutting down opposing strategies. It also utilizes colorless Eldrazi creatures like Devourer of Destiny and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger to apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. All Is Dust and Kozilek's Command serve as strong removal options, while World Breaker provides additional utility and disruption. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through efficient control and powerful threats.

The main idea of this deck is to control the board using Eldrazi creatures and powerful control spells. The deck focuses on ramping up to play big threats like Emrakul, the World Anew while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Command. The deck also utilizes artifacts like The Underworld Cookbook and the Talisman of Unity to help accelerate its game plan. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent through a combination of control elements and powerful Eldrazi creatures.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruption spells, aiming to maintain control of the battlefield while also draining the opponent's life total. It utilizes a mix of efficient removal spells, hand disruption, and powerful creatures to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The deck also includes graveyard recursion and sacrifice effects to generate additional value and maintain its tempo advantage. Overall, the deck aims to close out the game swiftly before the opponent can fully establish their own game plan.

This deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly using rituals and mana-producing cards to cast powerful spells like Past in Flames multiple times in a single turn. The goal is to consistently combo off and deal a massive amount of damage to the opponent in one explosive turn. Ral, Monsoon Mage and Glimpse the Impossible play a key role in drawing through the deck quickly, while Wish provides flexibility in accessing key cards from the sideboard. The deck aims to win the game quickly and efficiently by overwhelming the opponent with its powerful combo.

The deck focuses on utilizing cards like Indomitable Creativity, Persist, and Archon of Cruelty to create powerful combo plays that disrupt the opponent's game plan. It also includes cards like Wrenn and Six, Inquisition of Kozilek, and Lightning Bolt for additional control and removal. The deck aims to generate a high level of creativity by using various cards in unique ways to create powerful synergies and win conditions. By combining different pieces together, the deck strives to create unexpected and innovative strategies to outsmart the opponent and secure victory.
